fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Villainize.
- Their role's name is appended to have "... but EVIL!" at the end.
- Their role number has "-Evil" appended to the end.
- They are framed as a Neutral Evil Fearmonger.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you Villainize an evil role, you will instead append "... but GOOD!" at the end of their role name.
- They are framed as a Neutral Good Fearmonger (this subrole does not exist).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have 3 Villainized players die by any method, and live to see Town lose.
